Title: Decreases the distance from the high water mark certain lands under water of Gardiner's and Peconic bays have to be to be ceded to a county
Summary: Decreases the distance from the high water mark certain lands under water of Gardiner's and Peconic bays have to be ceded to a county from one thousand feet to five hundred feet.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-0302, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to decreasing the distance from the high water mark certain lands under water of Gardiner's and Peconic bays have to be to be ceded to a county
